MS.S: This module contains DSC resources for the management and configuration of Windows Server DNS Server.

## [2.0.0] - 2021-03-26_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Deprecated_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- **The module _x005F_xDnsServer_ will be renamed _DnsServerDsc_. Version `2.0.0`_x000D__x000A_ will be the the last release of _x005F_xDnsServer_. Version `3.0.0` will be_x000D__x000A_ release as _DnsServerDsc_, it will be released shortly after the `2.0.0`_x000D__x000A_ release** ([issue #179](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/179))._x000D__x000A_ The prefix 'x' will be removed from all resources in _DnsServerDsc_._x000D__x000A_- xDnsRecord will be removed in the next release (of DnsServerDsc) ([issue #220](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/220))._x000D__x000A_ Start migrate to the resources _DnsRecord*_._x000D__x000A_- xDnsRecordMx will be removed in the next release (of DnsServerDsc) ([issue #228](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/228))._x000D__x000A_ Start migrate to the resources _DnsRecordMx_._x000D__x000A_- The properties `DefaultAgingState`, `ScavengingInterval`, `DefaultNoRefreshInterval`,_x000D__x000A_ and `DefaultRefreshInterval` will be removed from the resource xDnsServerSetting_x000D__x000A_ in the next release (of DnsServerDsc) ([issue #193](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/193))._x000D__x000A_ Migrate to use the resource _DnsServerScavenging_ to enforce these properties._x000D__x000A_- The properties `EnableEDnsProbes` and `EDnsCacheTimeout` will be removed from_x000D__x000A_ the resource xDnsServerSetting in the next release (of DnsServerDsc) ([issue #195](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/195))._x000D__x000A_ Migrate to use the resource _DnsServerEDns_ to enforce these properties._x000D__x000A_- The properties `Forwarders` and `ForwardingTimeout` will be removed from the_x000D__x000A_ resource xDnsServerSetting in the next release (of DnsServerDsc) ([issue #192](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/192))_x000D__x000A_ Migrate to use the resource _x005F_xDnsServerForwarder_ to enforce these properties._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xDnsServer_x000D__x000A_ - Added automatic release with a new CI pipeline._x000D__x000A_ - Add unit tests for the Get-LocalizedData, NewTerminatingError, and_x000D__x000A_ Assert-Module helper functions._x000D__x000A_ - Added description README files for each resource._x000D__x000A_ - Add example files for resources_x000D__x000A_ - OptIn to the following Dsc Resource Meta Tests:_x000D__x000A_ - Common Tests - Validate Localization_x000D__x000A_ - Common Tests - Validate Example Files To Be Published_x000D__x000A_ - Standardize Resource Localization._x000D__x000A_ - Added the build task `Publish_GitHub_Wiki_Content` to publish content_x000D__x000A_ to the GitHub repository wiki._x000D__x000A_ - Added new source folder `WikiSource` which content will be published_x000D__x000A_ to the GitHub repository wiki._x000D__x000A_ - Add the markdown file `Home.md` which will be automatically updated_x000D__x000A_ with the latest version before published to GitHub repository wiki._x000D__x000A_ - Updated the prerequisites in the GitHub repository wiki (`Home.md`)_x000D__x000A_ that _Microsoft DNS Server_ is required on a node targeted by a resource,_x000D__x000A_ and that the DSC resources requires the [DnsServer](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/dnsserver)_x000D__x000A_ PowerShell module ([issue #37](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/37))._x000D__x000A_ - Added the base class `ResourcePropertiesBase` to hold DSC properties that_x000D__x000A_ can be inherited for all class-based resources._x000D__x000A_ - Added the base class `ResourceBase` to hold methods that should be_x000D__x000A_ inherited for all class-based resources._x000D__x000A_ - Added new private function `ConvertTo-TimeSpan` to help when evaluating_x000D__x000A_ properties that must be passed as strings and then converted to `[System.TimeSpan]`._x000D__x000A_ - Added new private function `Assert-TimeSpan` to help assert that a value_x000D__x000A_ provided in a resource can be converted to a `[System.TimeSpan]` and_x000D__x000A_ optionally evaluates so it is not below a minium value or over a maximum_x000D__x000A_ value._x000D__x000A_ - Added `prefix.ps1` that is used to import dependent modules like _DscResource.Common_._x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource_x000D__x000A_ - _DnsServerScavenging_ - resource to enforce scavenging settings ([issue #189](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/189))._x000D__x000A_ - _DnsServerEDns_ - resource to enforce extension mechanisms for DNS_x000D__x000A_ (EDNS) settings ([issue #194](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/194))._x000D__x000A_- xDNSServerClientSubnet_x000D__x000A_ - Added integration tests._x000D__x000A_- xDnsServerPrimaryZone_x000D__x000A_ - Added integration tests ([issue #173](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/173))._x000D__x000A_ - Added more examples._x000D__x000A_- xDnsRecordMx_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage MX records_x000D__x000A_- xDnsServerZoneScope_x000D__x000A_ - Added integration tests ([issue #177](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/177))._x000D__x000A_ - New read-only property `ZoneFile` was added to return the zone scope_x000D__x000A_ file name used for the zone scope._x000D__x000A_- xDnsServerZoneAging_x000D__x000A_ - Added integration tests ([issue #176](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/176))._x000D__x000A_- xDnsServerForwarder_x000D__x000A_ - Added integration tests ([issue #170](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/170))._x000D__x000A_ - Added new properties `Timeout` and `EnableReordering` ([issue #191](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/191))._x000D__x000A_- xDnsServerRootHint_x000D__x000A_ - Added integration tests ([issue #174](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/174))._x000D__x000A_- Added a class `DnsRecordBase` that is used as the base class for the resources that create DNS records._x000D__x000A_ - Added unit tests to get code coverage on unimplemented method calls (ensuring the `throw` statements get called)_x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordSrv_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage SRV records_x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordSrvScoped_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage scoped SRV records_x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordA_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage A records_x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordAScoped_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage scoped A records_x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordAaaa_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage AAAA records_x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordAaaaScoped_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage scoped AAAA records_x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordCname_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage CNAME records_x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordCnameScoped_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage scoped CNAME records_x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordPtr_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage PTR records_x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordMx_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage MX records_x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordMxScoped_x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource to manage scoped MX records_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xDnsServer_x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: Set the minimum required PowerShell version to 5.0 to support classes used in the DnsRecordBase-derived resources._x000D__x000A_ - Resolve style guideline violations for hashtables_x000D__x000A_ - Update pipeline files._x000D__x000A_ - Renamed the default branch to `main` ([issue #131](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/131))._x000D__x000A_ - Uses `PublishPipelineArtifact` in _Azure Pipelines_ pipeline._x000D__x000A_ - Unit tests are now run in PowerShell 7 in the _Azure Pipelines__x000D__x000A_ pipeline ([issue #160](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/160))._x000D__x000A_ - Merged the historic changelog into CHANGELOG.md ([issue #163](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/163))._x000D__x000A_ - Only add required role in integration tests pipeline._x000D__x000A_ - Updated the pipeline to use new deploy tasks._x000D__x000A_ - Revert back to using the latest version of module Sampler for the pipeline ([issue #211](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/211))._x000D__x000A_ - Fixed the sections in the GitHub issue and pull request templates to_x000D__x000A_ have a bit higher font size. This makes it easier to distinguish the_x000D__x000A_ section headers from the text._x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordBase_x000D__x000A_ - Changed class to inherit properties from 'ResourcePropertiesBase`._x000D__x000A_- xDnsRecordSrv_x000D__x000A_ - Now uses `[CimInstance]::new()` both in the resource code and the resource_x000D__x000A_ unit test to clone the existing DNS record instead of using the method_x000D__x000A_ `Clone()` that does not exist in PowerShell 7._x000D__x000A_- xDnsServerSetting_x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The mandatory parameter was replaced by the mandatory_x000D__x000A_ parameter `DnsServer`. This prevents the resource from being used twice_x000D__x000A_ in the same configuration using the same value for the parameter `DnsServer`_x000D__x000A_ ([issue #156](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/156))._x000D__x000A_- xDnsServerDiagnostics_x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The mandatory parameter was replaced by the mandatory_x000D__x000A_ parameter `DnsServer`. This prevents the resource from being used twice_x000D__x000A_ in the same configuration using the same value for the parameter `DnsServer`_x000D__x000A_ ([issue #157](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/157))._x000D__x000A_- xDnsServerPrimaryZone_x000D__x000A_ - Now the property `Name` is always returned from `Get-TargetResource`_x000D__x000A_ since it is a `Key` property._x000D__x000A_- xDnsServerForwarder_x000D__x000A_ - When providing an empty collection the resource will enforce that no_x000D__x000A_ forwarders are present._x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordSrv_x000D__x000A_ - Changed logic for calculating the record's hostname_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Removed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xDnsServer_x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The DSC resource xDnsARecord was removed and are replaced_x000D__x000A_ by the DSC resource xDnsRecord._x000D__x000A_ - Removing resource parameter information from README.md in favor of_x000D__x000A_ GitHub repository wiki._x000D__x000A_ - Remove helper function `Remove-CommonParameter` in favor of the one in_x000D__x000A_ module _DscResource.Common_ ([issue #166](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/166))._x000D__x000A_ - Remove helper function `ConvertTo-CimInstance` in favor of the one in_x000D__x000A_ module _DscResource.Common_ ([issue #167](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/167))._x000D__x000A_ - Remove helper function `ConvertTo-HashTable` in favor of the one in_x000D__x000A_ module _DscResource.Common_ ([issue #168](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/168))._x000D__x000A_- xDnServerSetting_x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The properties `LogIPFilterList`, `LogFilePath`, `LogFileMaxSize`,_x000D__x000A_ and `EventLogLevel` have been removed. Use the resource _x005F_xDnsServerDiagnostics__x000D__x000A_ with the properties `FilterIPAddressList`, `LogFilePath`, `MaxMBFileSize`,_x000D__x000A_ and `EventLogLevel` respectively to enforce these settings ([issue #190](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/190))._x000D__x000A_ This is done in preparation to support more settings through the cmdlet_x000D__x000A_ `Get-DnsServerSetting` for the resource _x005F_xDnServerSetting_, and these_x000D__x000A_ values are not available through that cmdlet._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xDnsServer_x000D__x000A_ - Enable Unit Tests to be run locally._x000D__x000A_ - Rename integr

This prevents the resource from being used twice_x000D__x000A_ in the same configuration using the same value for the parameter `DnsServer`_x000D__x000A_ ([issue #157](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/157))._x000D__x000A_- xDnsServerPrimaryZone_x000D__x000A_ - Now the property `Name` is always returned from `Get-TargetResource`_x000D__x000A_ since it is a `Key` property._x000D__x000A_- xDnsServerForwarder_x000D__x000A_ - When providing an empty collection the resource will enforce that no_x000D__x000A_ forwarders are present._x000D__x000A_- DnsRecordSrv_x000D__x000A_ - Changed logic for calculating the record's hostname_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Removed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xDnsServer_x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The DSC resource xDnsARecord was removed and are replaced_x000D__x000A_ by the DSC resource xDnsRecord._x000D__x000A_ - Removing resource parameter information from README.md in favor of_x000D__x000A_ GitHub repository wiki._x000D__x000A_ - Remove helper function `Remove-CommonParameter` in favor of the one in_x000D__x000A_ module _DscResource.Common_ ([issue #166](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/166))._x000D__x000A_ - Remove helper function `ConvertTo-CimInstance` in favor of the one in_x000D__x000A_ module _DscResource.Common_ ([issue #167](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/167))._x000D__x000A_ - Remove helper function `ConvertTo-HashTable` in favor of the one in_x000D__x000A_ module _DscResource.Common_ ([issue #168](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/168))._x000D__x000A_- xDnServerSetting_x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The properties `LogIPFilterList`, `LogFilePath`, `LogFileMaxSize`,_x000D__x000A_ and `EventLogLevel` have been removed. Use the resource _x005F_xDnsServerDiagnostics__x000D__x000A_ with the properties `FilterIPAddressList`, `LogFilePath`, `MaxMBFileSize`,_x000D__x000A_ and `EventLogLevel` respectively to enforce these settings ([issue #190](https://github.com/dsccommunity/xDnsServer/issues/190))._x000D__x000A_ This is done in preparation to support more settings through the cmdlet_x000D__x000A_ `Get-DnsServerSetting` for the resource _x005F_xDnServerSetting_, and these_x000D__x000A_ values are not available through that cmdlet._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- xDnsServer_x000D__x000A_ - Enable Unit Tests to be run locally._x000D__x000A_ - Rename integr
